channel.title: Free auth systems
channel.description:
Example one: http://www.impsoft.net/authsystem/demo/admin.php
-multi script -multi user -downloads are zipper and can include unlmited files -strings can be inserted automatically by the system to the identify the user down the road.
-advance logging of startups
You dont ask users for user/pass at script launch, the system auto adds it into the script and queries the webserver, it can also add random hashes to track down leakers if need be.
If anyone is really intrested in a pay auth system that involves not having the actual script on the users hard drive at runtime, ask me. This system involves md5 hasing scar plugin, handshaking, ect.

Example one:
http://www.impsoft.net/authsystem/demo/admin.php

-multi script
-multi user
-downloads are zipper and can include unlmited files
-strings can be inserted automatically by the system to the identify the user down the road.

-advance logging of startups

You dont ask users for user/pass at script launch, the system auto adds it into the script and queries the webserver, it can also add random hashes to track down leakers if need be.

If anyone is really intrested in a pay auth system that involves not having the actual script on the users hard drive at runtime, ask me. This system involves md5 hasing scar plugin, handshaking, ect.
